A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars the Last Jedi\, I have mixed feelings about this film but overall it was well done. I loved how it looked and it felt like star wars to me more so than force awakens. I did feel like some plot points were rushed and for a 2 and a half hour movie\, I feel Rian focused on the wrong things. Totally worth watching and should be watched at least twice to understand everything.
